channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for DE
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for DE

item.title: Report X-2025050941
item.description:
Report X-2025050941

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-10T03:46:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-30
  • City: NEWARK
  • State: DE
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SUPERVISOR FOUND PACKAGE WHILE DOING AUDITS IN UNLOAD IN THE BACK. PACKAGE CAME UP IN THE SYSTEM AS BEING A HAZMAT WITHOUT PROPER SHIPPING PAPERS AND DIAMOND LABEL.

item.title: Report X-2025050406
item.description:
Report X-2025050406

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-10T03:46:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-28
  • City: NEWARK
  • State: DE
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: WHILE EMPLOYEE WAS DOING AUDITS IN THE BACK ON UNLOAD, ONE OF THE PACKAGES HE SCANNED CAME UP AS A HAZMAT. UPON FURTHER INSPECTION, IT WAS FOUND OUT THERE WAS A HIGH OUTPUT LITHIUM BATTERY INSIDE THAT NEEDS A UN3480 LABEL ON THE OUTSIDE OF THE PACKAGE, WHICH THE PACKAGE DID NOT HAVE. SHIPPER AUDIT; NO DAMAGE

item.title: Report X-2025050449
item.description:
Report X-2025050449

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-10T03:46:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-25
  • City: NEWARK
  • State: DE
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: WHILE EMPLOYEE WAS UNLOADING PACKAGE CARS ON BELT 5, HEARING RATTLING SOUND COMING FROM ONE OF THE BOXES. SHE NOTIFIED HER SUPERVISOR AND UPON CLOSER INSPECTION THERE WERE 2 AEROSOL CANS INSIDE BOX WITHOUT THE PROPER MARKINGS ON THE OUTSIDE OF THE BOX. SHIPPER AUDIT; NO LEAK

item.title: Report X-2025050442
item.description:
Report X-2025050442

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-10T03:46:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-25
  • City: NEWARK
  • State: DE
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: WHILE EMPLOYEE WAS UNLOADING PACKAGE CARS ON BELT 5, HEARING RATTLING SOUND COMING FROM ONE OF THE BOXES. SHE NOTIFIED HER SUPERVISOR AND UPON CLOSER INSPECTION THERE WERE 2 AEROSOL CANS INSIDE BOX WITHOUT THE PROPER MARKINGS ON THE OUTSIDE OF THE BOX. AFTER CALLING THE HAZMAT HOTLINE, WE WERE TOLD TO REJECT THE PACKAGES.
